mapper.select:
SELECT A.F_BANK_JRNL_ID AS BS_NO, A.BANK_ID AS BANK_ID, B.NAME AS BANK_NAME, A.F_BANK_JRNL_ACC_ID AS BANK_ACC, C.ACC_CODE || ' - ' || C.ACC_DESC AS BANK_ACC_NAME, A.TRNSC_DT, A.F_BANK_JRNL_CRT_DT AS UPD_DT, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PAY0081D WHERE F_BANK_JRNL_ID = A.F_BANK_JRNL_ID) AS COUNT, A.F_BANK_JRNL_REM AS REMARK FROM PAY0079D A LEFT JOIN SYS0004M B ON A.BANK_ID = B.BANK_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0001M C ON A.F_BANK_JRNL_ACC_ID = C.ACC_ID AND C.IS_PAY_CASH = 1 LEFT JOIN SYS0047M D ON A.F_BANK_JRNL_CRT_USER_ID = D.USER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND A.F_BANK_JRNL_ID = #{bsNo}
AND A.TRNSC_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{tranDateFr} ,'DD/MM/YYYY') AND TO_DATE(#{tranDateTo} ,'DD/MM/YYYY')
AND A.F_BANK_JRNL_ACC_ID = #{bankAccount}
AND A.F_BANK_JRNL_CRT_DT >= TO_DATE(#{uploadDateFr} ,'DD/MM/YYYY') AND A.F_BANK_JRNL_CRT_DT < TO_DATE(#{uploadDateTo} ,'DD/MM/YYYY') + 1
AND D.NAME LIKE #{uploadUserNm} || '%'
ORDER BY A.F_BANK_JRNL_ID DESC

SELECT A.BANK_ID AS BANK_ID, C.NAME AS BANK_NAME, A.F_BANK_JRNL_ACC_ID AS BANK_ACC, D.ACC_CODE || ' - ' || D.ACC_DESC AS BANK_ACC_NAME, B.F_TRNSC_DT, B.F_TRNSC_REF_CHQ_NO, B.F_TRNSC_REF_VA_NO, B.F_TRNSC_REF3, B.F_TRNSC_REF1, B.F_TRNSC_REF4, B.F_TRNSC_REF2, B.F_TRNSC_REF6, B.F_TRNSC_REM, B.F_TRNSC_DEBT_AMT, B.F_TRNSC_CRDIT_AMT, B.F_TRNSC_TELLER_ID, B.F_TRNSC_NEW_CHQ_NO FROM PAY0079D A JOIN PAY0081D B ON A.F_BANK_JRNL_ID = B.F_BANK_JRNL_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0004M C ON A.BANK_ID = C.BANK_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0001M D ON A.F_BANK_JRNL_ACC_ID = D.ACC_ID AND D.IS_PAY_CASH = 1 WHERE A.F_BANK_JRNL_ID = #{bsNo} ORDER BY B.F_TRNSC_ID DESC

SELECT PAY0081D_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PAY0081D ( F_TRNSC_ID, F_BANK_JRNL_ID, F_TRNSC_DT, F_TRNSC_REF1, F_TRNSC_REF2, F_TRNSC_REF3, F_TRNSC_REF4, F_TRNSC_REF6, F_TRNSC_DEBT_AMT, F_TRNSC_CRDIT_AMT, F_TRNSC_IS_MTCH, F_TRNSC_REM, F_TRNSC_REF_CHQ_NO, F_TRNSC_REF_VA_NO, F_TRNSC_TELLER_ID, F_TRNSC_NEW_CHQ_NO, CRC_MAPPING_STUS_ID, OTH_KEYIN_STUS_ID, OTH_KEYIN_BC_STUS_ID ) VALUES ( #{fTrnscId}, #{fBankJrnlId}, TO_DATE(#{fTrnscDt},'DD/MM/YYYY'), #{fTrnscRef1}, #{fTrnscRef2}, #{fTrnscRef3}, #{fTrnscRef4}, #{fTrnscRef6}, #{fTrnscDebtAmt}, #{fTrnscCrditAmt}, 0, #{fTrnscRem}, #{fTrnscRefChqNo}, #{fTrnscRefVaNo}, #{fTrnscTellerId}, #{fTrnscNewChqNo}, 1, 1, 1 )

INSERT INTO ITF0900M ( IF_KEY, SEQ, IF_TYPE, TRAN_STATUS_CD, RGST_DT, RGST_TM, RGST_ID, BANKSID, BANKSEQ, BANKCO, BANKAC, INDATE, INREF1, INREF2, INREF3, INREF4, INREF5, INREF6, BNTYPE, BNDEBIT, BNCRDIT ) VALUES ( FN_CRT_IFKEY('900'), 1, '900', '10', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HHMMSS'), #{userId}, #{fBankJrnlId}, #{fTrnscId}, #{uploadIssueBank}, #{uploadBankAccount}, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{fTrnscDt},'DD/MM/YYYY'),'YYYYMMDD'), #{fTrnscRefChqNo}, #{fTrnscRef3}, #{fTrnscRef1}, #{fTrnscRef4}, #{fTrnscRef2}, #{fTrnscRef6}, #{fTrnscRem}, #{fTrnscDebtAmt}, #{fTrnscCrditAmt} )
